extendedInfo.description: Ride Chicago is an easy to use transit app for tracking Chicago CTA buses, L trains and PACE. It provides real-time PACE bus, CTA bus and 'L' train directions, arrival times, alerts, nearby stops. TRACKER APP FEATURES:---------------------------------------------------*** PLEASE SCROLL HORIZONTALLY TO VIEW PACE TAB ***â¢No Ads.â¢Create groups and organize your favorite stops/routes. â¢You can add bus and train stops or routes to your favorite list for quick access. â¢View all stop schedules in a group simultaneously. If there is more than one train/bus stops near you, you can add bus and train stops to a group and then you can view all the arrival times in a single screen. This feature helps you get  more than one train/stop arrival times at the same time.â¢Search and filter by stop name or route number.â¢Displays train stops in travel direction order instead of alphabetical order.â¢Provides arrival time estimates in minutes, local Chicago time, distance to stop in miles or feet, travel direction, destination name, route name, vehicle number. â¢Provides a functionality to display all routes at your stop and filter arrival times by train destinations.â¢Provides search bus/train routes and stops option.â¢Provides bus & train status and alerts (route changes, stop relocation etc)â¢View nearby bus and train stops in  list or map.â¢View bus schedules and real times locations on the map.* Buy Pro version to view METRA, South Shore Indiana schedules.This app is neither made nor endorsed by the CTA.

reviews.title: Efficient App!!!!
reviews.comment: So good I forget I have it. Stays in tune and timely!! Better with all the messed up routes in the city!!!!
reviews.author: Otha James

reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Erika Biurquis

reviews.comment: Exxon application I\'m so thrilled I found this I was using a different one before that was always off and now this one looks like it is doing the trick how thankful I am for this\tThis is a great app anybody who uses public transportation should have this app it is awesome better than any other app out there for public transportation thrilled with it
reviews.author: Denise Lazar

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is a great app. During our week-long trip to Chicago, it helped a lot. There was one time though when it said the next bus was 15 minutes away but it came in 1 minute.   Two features I would have loved: (1) ability to add favorites from the nearby screen, and (2) Metra!
reviews.author: Kevin Leuthold

reviews.comment: The best Chicago bus tracker out on God. But make the buttons more sensitive to touch you haf to press to hard
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Would be perfect if it weren\'t so glitchy..
reviews.author: Brandon Vega

reviews.title: A winner!
reviews.comment: must have for Chicago commuters on the go! up to the minute info finds routes and predicts arrivals, much easier to use than CTA website.
reviews.author: Gary Rejebian

reviews.title: Use it everyday
reviews.comment: Works very well, occasionally inaccurate but that could be due to the trackers on the train.
reviews.author: Tom Burdakin

reviews.title: Crappy App
reviews.comment: This app is very very inconsistent when it comes to certain bus stops. It will tell you the you have 27mins before the next bus comes but actually it\'s about 2-3mins away.
reviews.author: Darryl Seaton

reviews.title: Dependable
reviews.comment: This app is a keeper and a life saver

reviews.comment: Great app! More detailed and better accuracy the new CTA tracker
